exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R n : nat Unable to unify "SF_ly ?M2367 = SF_ly ?M2368" with "StepFun a b".

exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (@unzip2_behead _ _ (pairmap (fun x y : R => (y, f2 x y)) (head 0 P) (behead P))).
exceptions.exn: The reference P was not found in the current environment.

original: apply SF_ly_surj. unfold SF_ly. rewrite <- (@unzip2_behead _ _ (pairmap (fun x y : R => (y, f2 x y)) (head 0 P) (behead P))). f_equal. simpl. reflexivity.
